```{python}
from rich.console import Console
import bibtexparser
console = Console()
with open("bibliography.bib", encoding="utf-8") as bibtex_file:
  bibliography = bibtexparser.load(bibtex_file)
  papers_count = len(bibliography.entries)
  console.print(
      f":rocket: I had so much fun writing these {papers_count} papers. " +
      "I hope you enjoy reading them!"
  )
```
